title: Functional Replica - Artisan Set Card 7 of 9
content:
Revised text is highlighted.

Replace "Choose a Ranger's equipped gear" with Choose a Ranger's equipped tech.

Elder's notes: This change limits the Functional Replica's abuse potential by restraining what gear it is able to mimic. (As a bonus, it also makes the card a bit more thematic by no longer allowing you to replicate something like Quisi's Favorite Snack or some Trail Mix.)
